author: Rachel Chang / Bloomberg
title: China Increases Wuhan’s Official Coronavirus Death Toll by 1,290 Amid Lingering Mistrust of Its Numbers
description: China has revised its official count of deaths from the coronavirus, adding some 1,290 deaths in Wuhan.
content:
China has revised its official count of deaths from the coronavirus, adding some 1,290 deaths in Wuhan, the city where the virus first emerged last December.
The addition, reported by state media on Friday, brings the nationwide death toll to 4,636, the majo… [+2028 chars]
